description: This file implements a Knockout.js-based TodoMVC application, including custom bindings, view model, and routing logic.

classes.name: Todo
classes.description: Represents a single todo item with observable properties for title, completion status, and editing state.

methods.name: keyhandlerBindingFactory
methods.description: Creates custom binding handlers for specific keycodes (enter and escape).

methods.name: ViewModel
methods.description: Main view model managing the list of todos, filtering, editing, and persistence.
